title: GT Gap Auto-Detection
methodology: For each non-GT GOLDEN/HIGH/MEDIUM prediction, check if drug treats >=3 other diseases in same category with rank<=5. Top candidates manually assessed for FDA approval status.
pairs_added: Paclitaxel → germ cell testicular cancer (TIP regimen)
false_positive_patterns: Lidocaine for non-pain diseases (LA artifact, caught by h540)
key_insight: 50% of high-evidence novel predictions are GT gaps (FDA-approved but missing). Posaconazole alone had 5 missing indications for fungal diseases.
